pages.text: A $(item)Focus stores an iota.$(br2)It starts with nothing in it. Using $(action)Scribe's Gambit/$ while holding one in my other hand will pop the stack and save the iota into the $(item)Focus. Using $(action)Scribe's Reflection$/ will copy whatever's in the $(item)Focus/$ and push it onto the stack.

It occurs to me I could store a list of patterns in a $(item)Focus/$, and later recall them and evaluate them with $(action)Hermes' Gambit/$ to cast complex spells, or parts of spells, without having to draw them over and over.
$(italic)Grow the lawn and mow the lawn./$
